data.text: BVE竞赛特辑 Part 2
data.reasoning: This is the title of the video, indicating it's the second part of a special feature on the BVE competition.

data.text: 我们拍摄了关于我们的BVE投稿大赛2.0啊的学员投稿呢我分享了几个故事啊有笑有泪反应很不错大家看了都觉得原来马来西亚人做股市里面的价值投资是可以这么的精彩在平凡之中透露着里面很多的智慧在里面
data.reasoning: The speaker is sharing their positive reception to the participant submissions and expressing their belief that Malaysian value investors are 'splendid' and possess 'wisdom in the ordinary'.

data.text: 在我这边选出来的呢不是说保证会拿到我们的名次的但是哎今天呢我会给大家讲我们目前投票榜里面的人气最高的两个作品啊就是我们的作品第9号以及作品第12号啊这两个作品的人气是最高的
data.reasoning: The speaker states that they will be discussing two of the most popular submissions, number 9 and number 12, based on the current voting poll.

data.text: 第一个哈这个呢是一个大帅哥啊刚刚我才在槟城的讲座会上面呢遇到他啊我们的YJ同学来自BIS 24的那他给我们的这个作品呢主要特点就是排版非常漂亮OKso他是好像排一个杂志的封面这样子排啊那当然呢又放跟我的合照这样子那我就很容易注意到了对吧很懂得get老师的attention啊
data.reasoning: The speaker describes a participant named YJ, praising his work's layout and how he 'gets the teacher's attention,' which is a subjective positive assessment.

data.text: 不过呢不是我一个人决定胜负的啊各位同学在这一位呃年轻的投资者身上呢非常有趣的是他里面讲到的一个故事他也进行了一个fact finding就是当投资灵感出现的时候那我们可不可以用一些真凭实据去double Confirm就很多人选股啊有一个灵感呢呃这个股票好像行那到底有没有事实证明它行呢
data.reasoning: This introduces a core principle of investment analysis: validating an investment idea with factual evidence rather than just relying on intuition ('inspiration'). The speaker questions if one can use 'solid evidence to double confirm' an idea.

data.text: 他讲的一个真实的经历呢是香格里拉酒店这个公司啊我们知道马来西亚的香格里拉酒店呢是有上市的而疫情三年下来经营酒店的公司一定有亏损的情况发生那你的股价也大跌的
data.reasoning: This states a factual situation: Shangri-La Hotels Malaysia is a listed company, and hotel companies likely experienced losses and stock price drops due to the pandemic.

data.text: 当时候这个YJ同学呢也是有在BVE里面呢看到哎有老师开始留意香格里拉酒店那么如果从复苏概念股的角度顺藤摸瓜呢就很容易留意到啊对吗你产业信托尤其是酒店产业信托之后你就会顺藤摸瓜看到香格里拉酒店这个专门做hotel的上市公司
data.reasoning: This describes a logical chain of observation: YJ saw teachers discussing Shangri-La, and by looking at recovery concept stocks, particularly hotel REITs, one could easily identify Shangri-La as a listed hotel company.

data.text: 那我们当时候的这位学员呢他说他是在2022年4月份的时候而且写到明了4月16号他在自己的calendar那边写他是来吉隆坡旅行而刚好呢他住的地方呢就是UBN Tower其实是under香格里拉集团管理的而他在进入parking的时候呢他就发现到香格里拉酒店就在附近了
data.reasoning: This provides a specific, factual account of YJ's experience: visiting Kuala Lumpur on April 16, 2022, staying at UBN Tower (managed by Shangri-La), and observing Shangri-La Hotel nearby.

data.text: 那他就干脆上去香格里拉酒店那边呢去观察一下最近有没有人潮啊有没有招聘新员工啊然后当时呢4月马来西亚国门重新开放有没有外国旅客回流啊那然后呢他去parking lot的时候呢看到酒店的parking呢还有520多个empty的parking
data.reasoning: This details YJ's on-site observations: checking for crowds, new hires, returning foreign tourists after the border reopened, and noting 520 empty parking spots.

data.text: 他说他记得看过公司的年报里面呢年报里面讲一共有600多间房的那么有500多个空的parking他当时候的判断就是复苏的人流旅客的人潮应该还没有回来
data.reasoning: This combines YJ's memory of the company's annual report (600+ rooms) with his parking observation (500+ empty spots) to form a conclusion about the lack of tourist recovery.

data.text: 那这个并不是一个出过手买过的例子只是一个在思考过程里面一个学员他做过的东西那同学们会不会感觉这样子做股票的话呢踏实很多呢对比平时我们听到的那些朋友喂这个股票可以吗可以啊可以我睡下去哦做功课之后再加上亲眼所见那这个是我们鼓励同学们做价值投资的时候呢要有的一步来的哦
data.reasoning: The speaker expresses their positive view on YJ's method, stating it makes stock analysis feel 'much more solid' compared to casual recommendations and encourages this 'step' for value investors.

data.text: 我们给一个哇很多fact find的就是我们目前人气最高的9号作品呢来自槟城我们BIS第五期的Francis因为他是第二次参赛了那这一次呢他给了很多他做过的功课给我们所有的同学们看到
data.reasoning: This introduces participant Francis (submission #9), noting his extensive 'fact-finding' and his participation in previous competitions.

data.text: 那其实啊Francis的这个fact find呢我在2021年给同学们关于Chin Well这个公司的啊讨论的时候呢我有借用过他的fact find
data.reasoning: The speaker confirms they have previously used Francis's 'fact-finding' in their own teaching, specifically in a 2021 discussion about Chin Well company.

data.text: 所以呢我们会看到Francis有很多这样子的他去过一次啊一个公司的这个地方拜访啊比如他啊这个是SFP Tech是2022年 去年其中一个涨得最厉害的创业板的股票IPO PPHB刚刚公布的业绩呢也是非常漂亮的啊
data.reasoning: This provides examples of Francis's 'fact-finding': site visits to companies like SFP Tech (a high-growth GEM stock in 2022) and PPHB.

data.text: 那他只局限在槟城地区他可以做这个fact find啊所以如果我们的学员们在南中北马东马地区啊东海岸都有的话呢啊那这样子我们的情报工作呢就很大的帮助了
data.reasoning: This highlights the principle that localized 'fact-finding' by participants across Malaysia can significantly contribute to the collective intelligence gathering for the BVE platform.

data.text: 这个就是BVE平台的价值所在啊好像Francis这样子的学员呢他每拜访过一个公司呢都会有做一个这样子的记录的他的这个交上来的参赛作品呢就呃非常非常多的例子
data.reasoning: This states that participants like Francis, who meticulously document their company visits, demonstrate the value of the BVE platform.

data.text: 人气第二高的作品呢是作品12哦OK也有很多学员喜欢呐这个同学他一开始写的是存股定期存股那我就以为哎是一个被动型的投资者那看完了他的故事啊原来他变化出了他自己的做法哦也是我觉得很有亮点
data.reasoning: The speaker expresses that submission #12, initially appearing to be from a passive investor focused on 'buy and hold,' reveals an 'interesting' and 'highlighted' unique approach after reading the story.

data.text: 我们知道定期存股找一个under value的股票好公司要有track record遇到问题掉下来然后分批每个月慢慢去买它但是这个学生我看到它里面写的例子包括他讲到的板材类的股票包括他讲到的oil and gas的股票啊他用定期存股的方法用在一些底部回升复苏的板块身上
data.reasoning: This describes the common understanding of 'buy and hold' investing (undervalued stock, good track record, buy in batches) and then contrasts it with the participant's application of this method to 'bottoming out and recovering sectors' like building materials and oil & gas.

data.text: 那这一个呢是我们没有教但是他变化出来的做法我们教大家怎么判断undervalue我们也有教大家定期存股但是他自己结合在一起相当有意思
data.reasoning: The speaker finds the participant's innovative combination of learned concepts ('how to identify undervalued stocks' and 'buy and hold') with their own strategy 'quite interesting,' as it's something not explicitly taught by them.

data.text: 有哪些成功例子呢同学们可以去看他的作品12哈那作品12的同学是来自BIS 7的Jeff同学他作为一个师兄他给的这个改良的做法呢也令到很多的师弟师妹们呢感觉哎原来还可以这样子做
data.reasoning: This mentions that successful examples can be found in submission #12 by Jeff (BIS 7), and his refined approach has inspired junior participants.

data.text: 好再来多一个啊这一个其实也是我自己很喜欢的一个作品是作品第2号之前给大家讲过作品第1号啊是作为陈剑 老师我们松大老师松大教学平台的一个成绩检验那么这个2号作品呢里面也有我特别特别希望看到的东西我们希望学员进入的状态
data.reasoning: The speaker expresses a strong liking for submission #2, stating it embodies what they 'especially hope to see' in terms of a participant's investment mindset and progress.

data.text: 2号作品的这位Ms Chan他做到了Ms Chan他表演给我们看啊怎么样利用BVE资讯平台里面导师们给大家讲解的个股或者行业来进行汰弱留强
data.reasoning: This states that Ms. Chan (submission #2) demonstrated how to use the BVE platform's information to 'weed out the weak and keep the strong' in her investment portfolio.

data.text: 因为作品2的投稿人Ms Chan他也是我们GIS课程就是早期的学员像作品1作品2这样子的旧学员的整个transform的历程我是特别希望看到学员们的这个进步啊
data.reasoning: The speaker expresses a particular interest in seeing the 'transformation journey' of long-term participants like Ms. Chan (submission #2), highlighting their progress as a key motivation.

data.text: 那好作品2这边有看到了那他一讲呢就针对2022年去年是整个全世界的股市熊市状态因为美国不断的加息那在这个股市状态他做出跟股市不一样的投资成绩这个真的是非常有趣
data.reasoning: This highlights Ms. Chan's achievement in achieving 'different investment results than the stock market' in 2022, a year characterized by a global bear market and US interest rate hikes.

data.text: 他就讲到2022年他留意到曾经飙涨的这个科技股UWC他一直有关注因为2021年已经在明凯老师的BVE里面呢了解到这个公司的背景了他从2021年等到2022年了厉害有耐心啊
data.reasoning: This details Ms. Chan's focus on the tech stock UWC, which she had researched in 2021 via BVE and patiently waited until 2022 to observe.

data.text: 那2022年我们知道美国不断的加息科技股掉下来马来西亚科技股跟着跌就在他认为2022年的UWC已经浮现价值的时候呢他突然间流移到另外一个公司Coraza也是一个半导体领域的科技股啊那这个公司反而给他做出比UWC更加好的投资回筹哦
data.reasoning: This describes Ms. Chan's shift in focus from UWC to Coraza, another semiconductor tech stock, which yielded 'better investment returns' than UWC during the 2022 market downturn.

data.text: 啊这是第一个亮点那第二个亮点呢因为2022年熊市的悲观情绪呢啊随着美国的啊CPI上升还有美国的加息呢熊市的悲观情绪来到了一个高点那么他在BVE的视频里面呢有留意到我还有另外的(Jing Wei 小老师追踪的Optimax这个公司做眼睛的这个laser治疗的公司是2019年的时候上市的
data.reasoning: This introduces a second highlight for Ms. Chan's submission: her observation of Optimax (a laser eye treatment company listed in 2019) amidst the 2022 bear market sentiment.

data.text: 一上市不久就遇到Covid-19了而进入2022年Covid-19跟我们渐行渐远的时候呢我们就发现到Optimax的生意开始回来了那么这一位Ms Chan呢他就将他之前也是买了一个上市不久的股票HPMT他原本是被套住的
data.reasoning: This explains Optimax's situation: it faced challenges soon after its IPO due to Covid-19, but its business began recovering in 2022 as the pandemic subsided. Ms. Chan had previously been 'stuck' in another stock, HPMT.

data.text: 他从HPMT这个公司身上跳出来换成Optimax这个公司然后利用Optimax这个公司呢帮他自己在HPMT这个股票身上呢反败为胜哦
data.reasoning: This describes Ms. Chan's strategic move: switching from HPMT to Optimax and using the latter's performance to recover losses incurred in HPMT, achieving a 'comeback'.

data.text: 啊你看啊他已经给我们讲了怎么样利用BVE里面他get到的这些ideas帮自己的投资组合进行优胜劣汰那这个是非常非常好的我希望我们的学员呢在投资的过程里面呢要一直保留这个汰弱留强的这个理念
data.reasoning: The speaker praises Ms. Chan's ability to use ideas from BVE to 'weed out the weak and keep the strong' in her portfolio and emphasizes the importance of this principle for all investors.

data.text: 了很多我见到出问题的投资者啊他们多数都是汰强留弱就是赚钱的股票卖掉亏钱的股票收住这种做法是不会让你的投资组合越做越好倒返只会让你的投资组合越来越多有问题的烂臭股
data.reasoning: This outlines a negative investment principle observed in struggling investors: they tend to 'weed out the strong and keep the weak' by selling profitable stocks and holding onto losing ones, which is detrimental to portfolio growth.

data.text: 应该是汰弱留强将公司展望不好或者生意下跌的换成有更强的成长把握成长动力的那么你的股票组合呢就可以保持一个强的momentum状态
data.reasoning: This reiterates the positive principle of 'weeding out the weak and keeping the strong' by replacing companies with poor prospects or declining business with those having stronger growth potential, thereby maintaining portfolio momentum.

data.text: 那我们再看呢他例子不止这样子的他给了很多整个2022年他做过的例子这里他有提到的Hevea他是一个板材类的股票那在2022年下半年呢板材类的股票呢就失去了动力了那我就不知道这位Ms Chan是什么时候买入Hevea的因为它的成本价非常高在接近一块钱的这个位置so他决定从这股票身上抽身的时候呢账面亏损是66%
data.reasoning: This details another example from Ms. Chan: selling Hevea, a building materials stock that lost momentum in late 2022, at a 66% unrealized loss.

data.text: 但是他换去另外一个啊太阳能的光伏新星Sunview2022年去年第四季度上市的这个公司呢就帮他创造回83%的回酬也就是说经过这样子的淘汰更换他将之前表现不好的股票造成的亏损全部追回来也是反败为胜
data.reasoning: This shows Ms. Chan's successful switch to Sunview (a solar company listed in Q4 2022), which generated an 83% return, enabling her to recover previous losses and achieve a 'comeback'.

data.text: 他自己在这边形容的是将夕阳行业的股票转向朝阳行业的股票
data.reasoning: Ms. Chan describes her strategy as moving from 'sunset industry stocks' to 'sunrise industry stocks,' a descriptive and insightful analogy.

data.text: Ms Chan也有讲到的他非常佩服我们的JX小老师在2021年年尾啊股市里面的投资者还在疯狂炒作科技股的时候呢他已经将马来西亚产业信托板块REIT板块的精华呢带到松大的学员面前呢透过BVE我也有看不少啊他还做了非常详细的summary
data.reasoning: This highlights Ms. Chan's admiration for another instructor, JX, who introduced the essence of Malaysian REITs to students via BVE in late 2021, even when tech stocks were being heavily speculated on.

data.text: 那看得出来Ms Chan这个学员呢他所有的BVE老师都不放过啊包括他提到的David Chen老师Ms Hew哇她应该是不断的从BVE里面呢去寻找灵感然后去筛选他认为有把握的有成长的这些股票来帮自己的投资组合进行优化的
data.reasoning: The speaker observes that Ms. Chan diligently utilizes insights from all BVE instructors (David Chen, Ms. Hew, JX) to refine her investment portfolio with promising growth stocks.

data.text: so Ms Chan well done
data.reasoning: A direct positive affirmation and commendation of Ms. Chan's performance.

data.text: 其他的同学们想看的话记得在我们视频下方的顶置评论呢大家就可以免费的看到我们这几十个马来西亚投资者的投稿了
data.reasoning: This provides a factual instruction for viewers: to access the submissions, they should check the pinned comment below the video for free viewing of 'dozens of Malaysian investor submissions'.

data.text: 来我们最后给大家看一看呢这一个第19号作品其实是我们另外一位老师Ms Hew啊他觉得他很喜欢的作品来的
data.reasoning: The speaker introduces submission #19 as a work that another instructor, Ms. Hew, particularly likes.

data.text: 那他的标题是我以为我是巴菲特也就是说这位同学呢应该也是年少轻狂过吧觉得自己可以变成股神而且是轻易的在股市里面赚钱
data.reasoning: The speaker interprets the title 'I thought I was Buffett' to mean the participant, Mr. Lee, likely had an initial period of overconfidence ('young and frivolous') believing they could easily become a stock market 'god'.

data.text: 那这一位学员呢是来自BIS 30的Mr Lee那他的年龄呢哦原来38岁哎跟陈剑老师我差不多哦哎是啊各位同学我没有比他大多少罢了哦你们不会以为我40多50岁吧
data.reasoning: This provides factual details about participant Mr. Lee: he's from BIS 30, is 38 years old, and the speaker makes a humorous comparison to their own age.

data.text: 那这一位同学呢之前曾经是一个service engineer然后2022年呢他和老婆从中国回来然后遇到新冠疫情回不了中国那就在马来西亚这边呢享受人生吧然后看看YouTube刷刷Facebook然后呃看到了关于股票投资的介绍啊然后就马上对吗啊开个户口开始他的股票投资生涯了
data.reasoning: This recounts Mr. Lee's background: a former service engineer who, after returning to Malaysia with his wife in 2022 due to the pandemic, began his stock investment journey after seeing investment introductions on YouTube and Facebook.

data.text: 那当然呢结果就是烧到手了对吗然后股神巴菲特讲的只有在潮水退去的时候你才知道谁一直在裸泳那么他其实我看了之后为什么喜欢这个文章呢其实这个是一个啊曾经非常非常有自信来到股市投资者的一个心路历程
data.reasoning: The speaker believes Mr. Lee's story is compelling because it details the 'inner journey' of a once-highly confident investor who likely experienced losses ('burned his hands' / 'swimming naked when the tide recedes'), resonating with the speaker's own past experiences.

data.text: 那因为陈剑老师我自己也曾经在股市里面犯过大头症啊我讲话也曾经非常的大口气但是现在哪里敢呢对吗我们也只是一个普通的股市投资者罢了
data.reasoning: The speaker shares a personal reflection, admitting to having also experienced 'big-headedness' and speaking assertively in the stock market in the past, but now considers themselves 'just an ordinary stock market investor'.

data.text: 那这些故事都非常非常的真实跟动人
data.reasoning: The speaker expresses that the stories shared are 'very real and moving'.

data.text: 那么最后最后如果你们想知道到底哪一些作品成为最后的赢家其实我们已经给大家安排好我们的颁奖日期了日期就定在3月7号晚上8点钟那个是星期二来的
data.reasoning: This announces the date and time for the awards ceremony: March 7th, 8:00 PM, a Tuesday.

data.text: 没错就是陈剑老师平时我会跟大家公开做直播的星期二 3月7号这一天我们来一个special一点的直播我们进行颁奖典礼
data.reasoning: This clarifies that the awards ceremony will be conducted during the speaker's usual Tuesday live stream, making it a 'special' broadcast.

data.text: 我们这个特备直播呢到时候除了给大家知道谁是我们的得奖作品更加重要的对投资者们你们最大的价值啊我认为应该是可以告诉你们这些得奖人他做股票的时候有哪一些独特的心得
data.reasoning: The speaker believes the main value for investors in the special live stream will be learning the 'unique insights' of the award-winning participants regarding their stock investment strategies.

data.text: 那我们会挑选8个作品出来8个得奖作品都会给大家带来背后故事的主人翁都是跟你我一样普通的马来西亚打工族为什么他们能够做出这些高质量的价值投资的决策呢一定有一点窍门对吗那3月7号晚上我们帮你们将这些窍门挖出来分享给大家
data.reasoning: This states that 8 winning submissions will be selected, featuring their protagonists who are described as 'ordinary Malaysian working folks' like the viewers. The broadcast on March 7th aims to uncover the 'tricks' or insights behind their high-quality value investment decisions.
